metadata.description: The Nightstalker" begins in present day Philadelphia where a serial killer is leaving behind a gruesome trail of dismembered victims. Ted Banks, a young hot-shot journalist with a knack for digging up the truth, is assigned to cover the story. But his instinct tells him there's more to these murders than what meets the eye and he's determined to find out what exactly it is.
metadata.name: Sins of the Fallen
